about_the_game:
Rise of Civilization

  • Various civilizations emerge in endlessly, and you can choose freely. Whether it is the Roman Guards, Sparta, or Naginata Warriors are all fearsome existences on the historical battlefield.
  • Starting from the primitive man period, it has been continuously developed and replaced, from unarmed civilians to armored knights, different strategies are used in different periods, and your tactics are determined according to the actual battlefield.
  • Witness your empire spread on the world map. Preemption, invasion, plunder, and massacre are all effective ways to dominate.

Population Development

  • As long as you arrange the town population to work where you want them to work, they will continuously produce various resources for you to make your town develop faster.
  • No need to accumulate resources for the level of the main building, and spend countless days waiting for it to be upgraded. Everything depends on the population of your town. When the population is large enough, the town will automatically upgrade!
  • When you build a college in a town, you can arrange the smartest minds among the townspeople to conduct research in the college. They will produce scientific research points, allowing you to directly promote the development of science and technology, providing powerful And powerful production improvement and combat power growth!

Soldier general

  • Acquire heroes of different eras through recruitment, gather heroes of each era to fight together, and experience different cross-era battlefield experiences.
  • During the game, heroes of different eras and civilizations will be continuously discovered and obtained, as well as the true restoration of related historical events, so that players can feel the rise and fall, survival and death of different eras.
  • Equipment forging is an effective way to increase combat power. Through forging, you can obtain various weapons and equipment with special skills, which can be equipped on different heroes to experience more fun in the game.

Empire Origins

  • In selecting the continent of birth, you can switch between continents, and each continent has a unique civilization. The civilization you choose determines your initial units and generals.
  • Each civilization has unique styling features, whether European, Chinese, Japanese, or other architectural styles, all of which accurately restore the architectural features of the heyday of civilization.
  • With continuous exploration and development, handling diplomacy is the only way to determine whether you can dominate. Whether it is an alliance or a conflict determines the rise and fall of a country.

About the Game

Rise of Civilization

  • Various civilizations emerge in endlessly, and you can choose freely. Whether it is the Roman Guards, Sparta, or Naginata Warriors are all fearsome existences on the historical battlefield.
  • Starting from the primitive man period, it has been continuously developed and replaced, from unarmed civilians to armored knights, different strategies are used in different periods, and your tactics are determined according to the actual battlefield.
  • Witness your empire spread on the world map. Preemption, invasion, plunder, and massacre are all effective ways to dominate.

Population Development

  • As long as you arrange the town population to work where you want them to work, they will continuously produce various resources for you to make your town develop faster.
  • No need to accumulate resources for the level of the main building, and spend countless days waiting for it to be upgraded. Everything depends on the population of your town. When the population is large enough, the town will automatically upgrade!
  • When you build a college in a town, you can arrange the smartest minds among the townspeople to conduct research in the college. They will produce scientific research points, allowing you to directly promote the development of science and technology, providing powerful And powerful production improvement and combat power growth!

  • During the game, heroes of different eras and civilizations will be continuously discovered and obtained, as well as the true restoration of related historical events, so that players can feel the rise and fall, survival and death of different eras.
  • Equipment forging is an effective way to increase combat power. Through forging, you can obtain various weapons and equipment with special skills, which can be equipped on different heroes to experience more fun in the game.

  • In selecting the continent of birth, you can switch between continents, and each continent has a unique civilization. The civilization you choose determines your initial units and generals.
  • Each civilization has unique styling features, whether European, Chinese, Japanese, or other architectural styles, all of which accurately restore the architectural features of the heyday of civilization.
  • With continuous exploration and development, handling diplomacy is the only way to determine whether you can dominate. Whether it is an alliance or a conflict determines the rise and fall of a country.
name: Empire Origin:Rise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8.1 64 bit / Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2120 / AMD® FX 6350
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 660 (2GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) / Intel® Iris Pro™ 580 / Intel® Iris® Plus G7 / AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • Sound Card: soundblaster
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1650 (4GB) / AMD®
  • Sound Card: soundblaster

short_description: The grand strategy game "Empire Origin: Rise" is coming. Explore the traces left by human civilization on the earth, pursue the great achievements of the kings in the historical fragments, and revive the brilliant civilization in history. glory? territory? Waiting for you to dominate the world!
